commitMessage:
@@@[GOBBLIN-402] Add more metrics for gobblin cluster and fix the getJobs slowness issue

@@@[GOBBLIN-1508] Update cluster side metrics from gauge to meter (#3354)

Add a few metrics in Gobblin cluster and update some from counter to meter.  because meter can give both count and rate of an entity
